questions.title: Where can I enter my billing information?
questions.answer: Navigate to the panel, go to your [Account settings](https://panel.patchkit.net/account) and then look for Billing Information tab. You will find there a form to fill in.

questions.title: Are there custom plans available?
questions.answer: Yes, we're offering custom plans. We recommend contacting us directly by [email](mailto:contact@patchkit.net) or using our [configurator form](https://patchkit.net/pricing_configurator.html). Please note that by writing to us directly, we will be able to prepare a better plan for your needs.

questions.title: What are the payments methods?
questions.answer: Currently, the only payment methods are wire transfers and PayPal.me links.
